title: [Vornavian Coast, Beach]
description: A huge piece of driftwood, obviously once a large tree, lies not far from the pounding surf.  Fireflies hover by the fallen tree, their luminescent posteriors producing a flashing light.

A huge piece of driftwood, obviously once a large tree, lies not far from the pounding surf.  Seagulls and crows share the perches provided by the fallen tree, scanning the beach for signs of movement, and perhaps a meal, near the edge of the crashing surf.
